name: lmodvnegcl
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3
body: |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, clmod), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(cfv(c3, c1), c2))

stmt.origin: sylan(wcel(c0, clmod), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(cfv(c3, c1), c2), wcel(c0, cgrp))
stmt.pretty: sylan(c0 ∈ LMod, c1 ∈ c2, (c3 ` c1)∈ c2, c0 ∈ Grp)

body.origin:
|- wi(wa(wcel(c0, clmod), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(cfv(c3, c1), c2))
-| wi(wcel(c0, clmod), wcel(c0, cgrp))
-| wi(wa(wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(cfv(c3, c1), c2))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wa(wcel(c0, clmod), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(cfv(c3, c1), c2))
-| wi(wcel(c0, clmod), wcel(c0, cgrp))
-| wi(wa(wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(cfv(c3, c1), c2))

|- wi(wa(wcel(c0, clmod), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(cfv(c3, c1), c2))
-| wi(wa(wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(cfv(c3, c1), c2))

body.origin:
|- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(cfv(c3, c1), c2))
-| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c0))
-| wceq(c3, cfv(cminusg, c0))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wa(wcel(c0, clmod), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(cfv(c3, c1), c2))
-| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c0))
-| wceq(c3, cfv(cminusg, c0))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ ((c0 ∈ LMod ∧ c1 ∈ c2)→(c3 ` c1)∈ c2)
⊣ c2 =(Base ` c0)
⊣ c3 =(invg ` c0)

comment: Closure of vector negative. (Contributed by NM, 18-Apr-2014.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 19-Jun-2014.)
